text: Gei nia daane aalaa ga helekai gi mee, “God gi daawa ina mau mouli maa gimaua ga hagalee haga gila aga mau helekai aanei. Maa goe ga hagalee hagi anga gi dahi dangada i mau mee ala ne hai, gei gimaua ga hagababa adu gi di goe bolo gimaua ga hagahumalia goodou, i di madagoaa o Dimaadua ma ga dugu mai gi gimaadou tenua deenei.”
